News

Scalar 2016 agenda & registration

February 25, 2016

The registration for Scalar is now open! (see above)

Also, conference lineup is here! Check it out, we had a tough time choosing the best out of your great submissions.

Tweet

Scalar 2016 call for papers ends & free trainings announcement!

January 26, 2016

Reminder - only a couple days left to submit your proposal for the Scalar 2016.

Also VirtusLab and SoftwareMill will hold a free Scala training session, on the 15th of April.

Tweet

Scalar 2016 call for papers and call for topics is open!

December 10, 2015

The Scalar 2016 C4P is officially open! We are waiting for your proposals until 31st of January, but also accepting talks on a rolling basis.

Fill in the form here.

Tweet

Scalar 2016 is officially announced

November 17, 2015

Catch Scalar in 2016! We are keeping up the momentum and the third edition of Scalar conference is on track.

Since this conference is free-to-attend, we are looking for “community angels” and sponsors. So, spread a word!
